title: How Kari Lake Went From News Anchor to Outspoken Critic of the Press
description: Former friends and colleagues of Ms. Lake, the Republican nominee for governor, say they remember her far differently from the candidate they see today.
dc:creator: Jazmine Ulloa
media:credit: Rebecca Noble for The New York Times
media:description: Kari Lake, the Republican candidate for Arizona governor, during a Save America rally last month with former President Donald Trump in Mesa, Ariz.
